text: Newton Ennis Morton (21 December 1929 - 7 February 2018) was an American population geneticist. He was born in Camden, New Jersey. He was one of the founders of the field of genetic epidemiology. Morton died on 7 February 2018 in Southampton, England at the age of 88.Newton Morton ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2018 deaths Category:American geneticists Category:Scientists from New Jersey Category:People from Camden, New Jersey
title: Newton Morton
